about_the_game:
In the Multiverse everything is possible, so each level is another world, another universe, live this incredible adventure and at the same time go through the history of video games.

A story mode where each level is another universe so the graphics change completely, it can be a 2d world. 3d, abstract worlds, changing the same mechanics and controls

Gameplay: Embark on Dimensions, an interdimensional journey where each level is a universe with its own identity. Imagine diving into worlds where reality transforms before your eyes, from retro 2D landscapes to vast 3D environments, through artistic styles like pixel art, cel shading, low poly, and more. In Dimensions, you won’t just explore these universes; you’ll live an adventure filled with action, challenges, and surprises.

Each universe is a unique level, with its own rules and conditions that will force you to adapt and overcome enemies, obstacles, and clever puzzles. Discover hidden objects, weapons, and abilities that will allow you to advance and unravel the mysteries of each dimension. Dimensions is an ode to diversity and creativity, a game that challenges your skill and wit at every turn.

The Story: In the year 2115, humanity teeters on the brink of catastrophe. The magnate of Culiacán, a feared Mexican mobster with a robotic body, holds the power to unleash a nuclear war that could obliterate civilization. As the doomsday clock inexorably ticks toward midnight, Saul Crowel, the enigmatic leader of Crowel Industries, emerges as an unlikely savior. In collaboration with a secret U.S. military division, Crowel aims to transform the World Earth Council and enforce a coerced peace. His secret weapon: unveiling interdimensional travel, a technology that could shift the global balance of power and catch enemy forces off guard.

Saul Crowel, a corporate tycoon, thwarts global nuclear annihilation with his charisma. His intentions may not be selfless, yet he is the man the world desperately needs now.


In this alternate universe, beings with supernatural powers walk among us, though they are exceedingly rare. Representing a mere 0.0002% of the population, these individuals live with dormant abilities that only manifest after experiencing an intense emotional catalyst. Persecuted and oppressed, these beings often become outcasts, their powers surfacing in moments of despair and rage, prompting them to lash out against a society that has marginalized them.

However, there is an elite group within the American government, the Instigators, beings with extraordinary abilities who operate in the shadows to prevent catastrophes before they occur. On their mission to stop the magnate of Culiacán, the Instigators uncover the dark machinations of Crowel Industries and the government. Faced with hidden truths, they are forced to make a critical decision: to support Crowel’s plan for imposed peace or to confront him and risk plunging the world into chaos. Their choice will not only define their fate but will also determine the future of humanity.

highlighted.name: The cure for everything but love

content_descriptors.notes: In addition to moments where there may be excess blood, there are also a couple of nude scenes.

name: DIMENSIONS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F 2.9GHz / AMD Ryzen R5 1600.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Dimensions: Each level is a new challenge in a different universe. Explore, adapt, and overcome in an interdimensional journey full of surprises.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
